Description.Name: Ambush
Description.Details: Sumire is worried, though she hides it well, catching you as soon as the drop is complete, while the MechWarriors are still disembarking. "Commander, I've identified that ship I warned you about. It's Taurian, and they don't sound happy."

Description.Name: Get Lady Arano on the line
Family Reunion
Description.Details:
Alexander catches you privately for a few moments. "Thank you for your assistance in the matter, Commander. And I don't just mean on the battlefield, impressive as your victories have been."

The rest of the command staff wait for you in the conference room.
